# scroll background with camera

Sets the background image to scroll whenever the camera moves. The background can be set to scroll only horizontally, only vertically, or in both directions and will loop when at the edges.

```sig
scroller.scrollBackgroundWithCamera(scroller.CameraScrollMode.OnlyHorizontal)
```

## Parameters

* **mode**: Controls which axes the background image will scroll in
* **layer**: Chooses the parallax layer this operation applies to. Defaults to 0

## Example #example

In this example we give a sprite a velocity and scroll the camera with it to give the appearance that it is flying upwards infinitely.

```blocks
scene.setBackgroundImage(img`
```
